name: Chronicles of Rheia
description:
Queen Alianor and her court mage tried to get a champion for years. With your arrival, they may get what they wanted… or they may get their downfall.

Welcome to the world of Rheia, where champions are the hands of kings and queens. Here you are free to do as you please: you can be the champion of queen Alianor or you can refuse her offer, you can help or you can harm, you can become a monarch yourself, you can do anything. On your journey you may find allies, temporary or not. But beware or you may encounter the god of destruction.

This game features:

- the possibility to choose your hero

- up to 2-3 hours of gameplay depending on the path you choose

- 4 different endings

- 4 possible permanent party members

- optional side quests
